programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A veteran who is assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources, begins to question his mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Hollywood action superstar Jason Statham essays the role of Frank Martin, a former Special Forces operator, who is hired by unknown clients to transport goods, human or otherwise, from one place to another. He is known to be the best in the business, as he transports anything without asking any questions and is always on time. However, complications arise when a job goes astray and he has to save the life of his female cargo. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join the Monsters University in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. While Mike is serious about his ambitions, his peer Sulley whiles away most of his time. A special programme Roar Omega Roar becomes the perfect opportunity for them to showcase their skills. But when they play mischief with Dean Abigail Hardscrabble, she forbids them from participation. Mike decides that he will participate in the Scare Games challenge and takes a vow to leave school in case he loses. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Monster Hunt 2
programme.desc: (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: With immunity on the line, Heston Blumenthal challenges the contestants to make a delicious dessert using a popular breakfast ingredient. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Thomas loses his memory and finds himself trapped in a massive maze called the Glade. He and his friends try to escape from the maze and eventually learn that they are subjects of an experiment. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Interracial couple Chris and Rose go on a weekend getaway to the latter's parents' home. Chris is initially sceptical because Rose's parents are unaware he is African American, but nothing prepares him for the horrors that await him. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Iron Man
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: The headquarters of the Kingsman organisation is destroyed by Poppy Adams, a psychotic leader of the world's largest drug cartel, the Golden Circle. Although Eggsy and Merlin survive the attack, they need help to go against the resourceful drug cartel and contact their allies in the United States. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: With immunity on the line, Heston Blumenthal challenges the contestants to make a delicious dessert using a popular breakfast ingredient. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Shane Wolfe, a Navy SEAL, fails to rescue a government scientist, Howard Plummer, from Serbian rebels. Later, he is assigned to protect Plummer's children from his enemies. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Sam misses his father, a virtual world designer, and enters a virtual space that has become much more dangerous than his father intended. Now, both father and son embark upon a life-and-death journey. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain Marvel
programme.desc: In 1995, Starforce member Vers and her team are sent to Earth in order to rescue an undercover operative infiltrating the Skrulls, the shapeshifters. During her mission, Vers gets separated from her team and is stranded on Earth. She meets S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent Nick Fury and with his help finds out that she had a life on Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: In a faraway swamp, in solitude, lives the green ogre 'Shrek', brought to life by the iconic Mike Myers. His lonely existence is infested with fairytale characters, sent there by the evil Lord Farquaad, who wants him to rescue his beautiful bride-to-be, Princess Fiona (Cameron Diaz) and thus, he sets out with Donkey, voiced by the unmatchable Eddie Murphy, to wage a war against a fire-breathing dragon and rescue the princess. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp
programme.desc: With a few days left of his house arrest, Scott Lang dons the suit to help Hank and Hope 'the Wasp' Pym, who are on a risky quest to bring back Janet, Hope's mother, from the quantum realm while evading a powerful ghost-like being. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Forced to adopt a civilian identity and stuck in a white-collar job, Mr Incredible itches to get back into action. When he is lured into a trap by the evil Syndrome, his family contrives to save him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Toy Story 4
programme.desc: Woody takes upon himself to protect Bonnie's new favourite toy, Forky, who is experiencing an existential crisis as he considers himself to be trash. Later, while the family is on a road trip, Forky jumps out of the RV and Woody pursues him. He convinces him to return, but on their way back they find several lost toys and an old friend. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Glass Houses
programme.desc: Carrie Dawson is a teenage babysitter who learns about a humiliating family scandal and the person who is suspected to be the reason for it. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Circus performer Holt Farrier returns home after the First World War and is tasked with caring for a newborn elephant with oversized ears, Dumbo. The circus is undergoing a financial crisis but when it is discovered that Dumbo can fly, vultures close in under the pretext of making him an icon. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: This live-action retelling of the Disney classic follows Belle, who has taken her father's place in the Beast's castle and befriended its enchanted servants. She soon discovers the reason behind the creature's frightful exterior and begins appreciating his true nature. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Spies In Disguise
programme.desc: Lance Sterling, a secret agent, finds himself transformed into a pigeon. He then sets out with his associate Walter to stop a villain who is using Sterling's disguise to carry out a dangerous plan. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita (Joely Richardson) and computer game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs puppies are kidnapped by Anitas boss Cruella De Vil (Glenn Close), who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the fur coat she has set her heart on. Enlisting the help of the other animals, Pongo and Perdita set out to find and rescue the pups from their fearsome captors. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Curse Of Chucky
programme.desc: Chucky is back and he is meaner than ever. This means that he still loses his temper at his human counterparts and goes out on a murdering rampage. Stuck in a doll's body, the murderous soul is delivered mysteriously to a peaceful home. As soon as he arrives, he decides to murder Nica's mother. But Nica soon catches up and realises that the doll is not what it seems like. Now she must make sure that the Chucky is dealt with before he kills more people in the family. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim is envious of his baby brother. But his animosity towards him doesn't last long when he learns that this baby, who calls himself The Boss, can talk and behave like an adult and is on a mission to stop Puppy Co from replacing the love for babies with puppies. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The New Mutants
programme.desc: A bunch of five young mutants who have suffered traumatic experiences are admitted into a secret facility. While they believe they are undergoing treatment to cure them of the dangers of their superpowers, they soon begin experiencing terrifying visions related to their past and question the safety of the institution. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Wade Wilson AKA Deadpool learns what it means to have a family as he attempts to save Russell, an orphaned mutant, who is being hunted by Cable, a genetically enhanced soldier from the future trying to prevent the death of his wife and daughter. (Film - Action)

While they believe they are undergoing treatment to cure them of the dangers of their superpowers, they soon begin experiencing terrifying visions related to their past and question the safety of the institution. Meanwhile, Winston and the Bowery King have to face the consequences of helping John kill the crime lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton (Colin Farrell) is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. His intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of veteran Walter Burke who squires him through the Agencys difficult training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks. Clayton is then given a special assignment, to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Rafe and Danny, played by the dashing Ben Affleck and handsome Josh Hartnett, are childhood friends. Both of them share a love for planes and grow up to be Air Force pilots. When one of the two dies in battle, the other is left to fill the void of his friend's absence and move on. A romantic encounter takes place post the sudden tragedy. Directed by Michael Bay, the movie was nominated for four Academy Awards including Best Sound and Original Song, sung by Diane Warren. The movie bagged an award for Best Sound Editing. (Film - War)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Starring action stalwarts Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger, the movie revolves around the exploits of a security system expert who is imprisoned in a high-tech prison and must figure out an ingenious way to escape. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must save Jack Sparrow and form an alliance with the pirates around the world to fight against the East India Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton (Colin Farrell) is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. His intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of veteran Walter Burke who squires him through the Agencys difficult training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks. Clayton is then given a special assignment, to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: When Oishi, a samurai, is released from captivity, he learns that his master, Lord Asano, was bewitched into attacking Lord Kira, who wanted to rule the Ako Domain. He gathers 47 ronin and Kai, a half-breed to avenge his master's death. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: After Scrat's pursuit of an acorn sets off a series of asteroids to strike Earth, Manny, Sid, Diego and their herd must find a way to survive the impending doom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a renowned French chef. However, he fails to realise that people despise rodents and will never enjoy a meal cooked by him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: The third film in this animation franchise follows Lightning McQueen, who enlists the help of race technician Cruz Ramirez to get back in the racing game after the rise of a younger, faster generation of racers. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Johnny Depp reprises his iconic role as the constantly flinching, smirking and cunning pirate, Captain Jack Sparrow, in the fourth installation of the Pirates of the Caribbean series, which is directed by Rob Marshall. Jack and Captain Barbossa set out on a journey to find the legendary fountain of youth. But he must face the fearsome pirate Blackbeard and his enigmatic daughter Angelica, who are also in search of the fountain. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: When a rogue army of humans kills Caesar's wife and son, he sets out to exact revenge. But his quest for retribution reveals his darker instincts even as he makes a startling discovery. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

(Film - Horror)

programme.title: What We Do In The Shadows

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: War veteran Will Sawyer is entrusted with the task of assessing the security of a high-profile building in China. He gets framed when aides of an international terrorist hack into the security system of the building. Sawyer then struggles to prove his innocence and save his family trapped in the fire. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Norah, a mechanical engineer, and her team must deal with an earthquake while they are working at the bottom of the Mariana Trench. While they try their best to get out of the ordeal, they discover that a few creatures belonging to an unidentified species are out to get them. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and his family embark on a journey to search for a new place to live after their cave is destroyed. A young boy helps them trek through unknown places to find new shelter. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Mercenaries William and Tovar are imprisoned in the Great Wall by a faction called the Nameless Order, which battles alien monsters that attack every sixty years. Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: Tony Stark is under pressure from various sources, including the government, to share his technology with the world. He must find a way to fight them while also tackling his other enemies. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Teri Kasam
programme.desc: A spoiled rich girl falls for a poor aspiring musician. But after they marry, their egos and respective stubbornness cause them to drift apart. (Romance)

programme.title: Suhagan
programme.desc: Suhaagan is a story about two sisters Janaki and Jyoti who live with their Parents Jamnadas and their mother played by Tanuja. Ramu lives in the same village and makes living by farming. Ramu loves Janaki but Janaki is not that interested in Ramu because she is more attracted to Murli who is much more wealthy than Ramu. Jamnadas prefers Ramu as being Janaki's husband because he thinks he is a good person and will not ask for big dowry. Janaki get married to Ramu and that is when all the trouble starts. (Romance)

programme.title: Anushka
programme.desc: A newly married couple witnesses strange incidents while travelling to a guest house. They feel relieved once they reach their destination, unaware that things are about to get worse. (Thriller)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan and Sharad Kapoor are the leaders of the two rival gangs. Aishwarya Rai is Shah Rukh Khan's twin sister. Shah Rukh is in love with Priya Gill. Chandrachur Singh is Sharad Kapoor's younger brother who studies in a catering college in Bombay. He comes to Goa to visit his brother and plans to go back and start a restaurant there. He sees Aishwarya and falls in love with her. Chandrachur gives up the idea of going back to Bombay and opens a bakery in Goa. When Shah Rukh comes to know about the romance between Aishwarya and Chandrachur, the fight between the gang turns more violent. How the conflict is resolved is the rest of the story. Written by gavin@sunny_deol2009@yahoo.com (Action,Drama,Musical,Romance)

programme.title: Bewafaa
programme.desc: Anjali, living in Canada with her parents, hides her relationship to the musician Raja from her parents. When her sister dies during the birth of twins, she abandons her love, marries the widower Aditja and moves to New Delhi to become the new mother of her sister's children. Three years later, when Raja visits Delhi on his concert tour their love inflames again. (Drama)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Kasoor
programme.desc: The film starts with the murder of Priti (Divya Dutta), wife of Shekhar (Aftab Shivdasani), a well-known journalist. Inspector Lokhande (Ashutosh Rana) investigates the case and accuses Shekhar of the murder, saying he has enough evidences to arrest him. Upon getting bail from the court, Shekhar's lawyer tells him that he will not be able to fight his case because he is a corporate lawyer. He asks him to contact Simran Bhargav (Lisa Ray), who is a criminal lawyer to fight his case. (Drama,Mystery,Thriller)

programme.title: Pardesi
programme.desc: Myna rescues Ajay, who is bitten by a snake, but he loses his memory. He begins a new life with Myna and her family and the two fall in love, much to her secret lover's outrage. (Drama)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: A well-meaning but disgraced cop, is determined to fight a corrupt system, taking to task miscreants and criminals in his city. (Action)

programme.title: Baaghi
programme.desc: Saajan is a college youth, enjoying his life, meets with Kajal the girl of his dreams at a brothel. Kajal is an innocent victim of Dhanraj, who runs this brothel. Saajan eventually falls in love with Kajal, but this love affair is not acceptable to the society, which includes his parents Mr. and Mrs. Sood. Saajan's dad Col. Sood wants his son to join the Indian army. On the other side, this relationship of love is also not acceptable to Dhanraj, since he doesn't want any of his brothel girls to go into normal respectable society. Trapped between both, Saajan, along with his friends, rescues his love from the brothel. But the question remains: Will Saajan's parents accept him along with Kajal or Will Dhanraj's evilness overcome the couple's love? (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Partner
programme.desc: The only male child in the family that sired six daughters, Prem has empathy towards the fair sex and decides to assist males to woo women so much so that he becomes popular as the 'Love Guru'. Amongst the men he assists are Bhaskar Chaudhry and Neil Bakshi. Klutz-like Bhaskar has fallen head over heels with his boss, a model and heiress, Priya Jaisingh. A disbelieving Prem refuses to assist him, but subsequently relents. Bhaskar uses his own charm to woo Priya successfully, and is introduced to her dad, Raj. Prem himself falls in love with a widowed single mother, Naina Shahani, a Journalist. Both men are satisfied with her respective lives not knowing that a scandalous secret will surface in the media - changing their lives forever. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Zeher A Love Story
programme.desc: Siddharth, a police officer who is soon to be divorced, has an affair with Anna. However, when she is found dead, he realises he got more than he bargained for. (Thriller)

programme.title: Johny I Love You
programme.desc: Son of reformed criminal Suraj Singh, Johny (formerly Raju) falls in love with a woman out of his caste. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema is told by his father, Dinu, that generations of their family have always been slaves to the wealthy Thakurs. When Bheema does not heed this, and not only befriends Sonam, Thakur Daulat Singh's daughter, but also has a physical altercation with Raja Bahadur, Thakur's son, he is publicly whipped. Shortly thereafter his dad passes away after being bitten by a snake. Daulat finds out that Sonam likes Bheema and has her moved to London, and ensures that she forgets him. Subsequently, on her return as an adult she returns home and is told that Bheema is serving 3 years in prison for killing a male named Shamsher Singh. Nevertheless, she renews her friendship with him but will soon find him on the run from the Police - this time for killing a union leader named Kumar. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Agent 116 Gopal (Dharmendra) is assigned the case to solve the mystery behind the missing of young women in Bombay. (Thriller,Action)

programme.title: Pehchaan
programme.desc: A convict by the name of Yogi Shankar is accused of sexual molestation in court. The Judge Jagdish Verma who is responsible for passing Jogi's sentence is well aware of Jogi's behavior as he was once Jogi's defense advocate. With no hesitation Jagdish Verma grant a seven years period of rigorous punishment to Jogi despite his pleadings. The Judge family consists of his wife Urmilla, sons Kunal and Karan Verma; on completion of his seven years sentence Jogi is released from jail and abducts Urmilla, finds out that she is pregnant, ensures that she gives birth to a baby girl Tina and then kills her. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Veer
programme.desc: Circa 1920 British India, Pindari leader, Prithvi Singh, narrates his story to a Report from London Times about betrayal and deceit at the hands of the British and Madhavgarh's Raja Gyanendra Singh which led to the massacre of 4500 Pindaris. Although Prithvi sliced off Gyanendra's right arm, he has sworn to avenge and behead him and two-faced Britishers - who on one hand preach about Justice, Fraternity and Equality, but conquer and rule vulnerable natives - fueling hate and division on lines of religion, and caste. He sends his sons, Veer Pratap and Poonam, to Britain to learn about their devious ways, so that he can conquer Madhavgarh. The duo, despite of Lord Macaulay's malicious policy to convert foreign nationals to his way of thinking, not only pick up the relevant skills but also slay Yuvraj Sujan Singh, the only son of Gyanendra, much to the joy of the Pindaris. (Action)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Inteha
programme.desc: Tina Saxena lives a wealthy life-style with her widowed businessman dad. One day, all of a sudden, she gets a nasty shock when her dad informs her that he had a mistress before he was married to her mother, and that this affair had resulted in the birth of a daughter, Nandini. Much to Tina's distaste, he invites Nandini to live with them, and asks her to look after Tina after he passes away, as he has been ill for quite sometime. Mr. Saxena does pass away, leaving a grieving Tina and Nandini, with Tina still having nothing to do with her step-sister. Then a dashing young man, Ranbir Oberoi, enters Tina's life and it is love at first sight for them. Nandini also approves of him, and it looks like Tina has given up on her dislike for Nandini. After a few days, and a purse-snatching incident, Nandini counsels Tina that she should consider breaking up with Ranbir. Aghast at this sudden volte face. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Anokhi Ada
programme.desc: A ruthless gangster worms his way into the affections of a timber merchant. Using lies, deceit and murder he plots to usurp the place of the merchant's son, steal his inheritance and his girl. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Insaniyat
programme.desc: A Police officer seeks the help of two gangsters to combat terrorism. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Zakhmi Sipahi
programme.desc: Shakti is an honest police officer out to avenge the death of his father, Gautam Gorakhnath, and the trials and obstacles he faces while he goes through corruption, love, and usual Hindi film masala. (Action)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that Editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he come across evidence that would expose some very influential people. (Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close and very wealthy friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship to a relationship when Vijay proposes marriage on behalf of his sister, Shobha, with Pranlal's son, Amar. Pranlal agrees, and preparations are on for the marriage to take place. Vijay finds out that Pranlal and his men are using their business as a front for drugs and smuggling, and he decides to cancel the wedding. Pranlal is angry with Vijay, but refuses to give up his criminal career. When Amar finds out about his dad's spurious activities, he kills himself. Pranlal, humiliated and angered, vows to avenge Amar's death, and wants Shobha to be Amar's widow for the rest of her life, which is not acceptable to Vijay. Then Shobha meets with a handsome stranger named Jackie, who rescues her. She offers him employment with her brother's firm, and they fall in love with each other. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Shiva Shakti
programme.desc: Shiva travels to the city to earn money for his sister Kusum's marriage. He meets Shakti and they become friends. When Kusum gets pregnant with Shakti's child, Shiva vows to murder him. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: Honest and diligent Police Inspector Amar lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay. In his attempt to arrest bandit Sher Singh, he and Inspector Dayal are attacked, Amar survives, but Dayal gets his legs crushed under a truck and becomes wheelchair-bound. Subsequently, Amar arrests local politician, Jagannath Prasad, who not only gets released without getting charged but Amar gets reprimanded, and decides to resign. Shortly thereafter, Sher Singh hijacks a bus and holds the passengers in exchange for 25 of his jailed associates. Dayal's granddaughter, Seema, is amongst them, and Dayal asks Amar for assistance. Amar, along with ex-convict, Qasim Ali, and Karan, a drug-dealer, does manage to rescue them but differences crop up between the trio and they part ways. Then Amar finds out that Qasim and Karan have masterminded a plan to facilitate the escape of the 25 convicts, and decides to confront them. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Asmaan Se Ooncha
programme.desc: Action - A longstanding feud between bitter rivals yields an unexpected friendship in this tale of ambition, violence and love starring Jeetendra and Raj Babbar. Engaged in an ongoing dispute with his archenemy, Nagraj, a man named King sets out to kill the police officer who's interfered in his affairs. But through a remarkable twist of fate, King and the cop end up friends. Now, the two must face the formidable Nagraj -- who wants them both dead. - Ajitesh, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Raj Babbar (Family,Action,Drama)

programme.title: 16 December
programme.desc: White collar crimes that drain the nation of precious foreign exchange is connected to the funding of international terrorism. The much-told Hollywood theme is retold in the Indian context with much needed technical wizadry. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Indra - The Tiger
programme.desc: Indra opens in a village in Andhra Pradesh showing the rivalry between two families. A police officer wishing to end this hostility comes up with the proposal of marriage between the two families which ultimately is used by Shivraj as a trap to finish off his rival. After the funeral, no one is willing to stake claim for the leadership of the clan when the young Indrasena Reddy comes in and tells his grandmother that he will. (Drama)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mumbai Meri Jaan
programme.desc: Raju comes to Mumbai in search of a job and becomes a peon for a big firm. He soon discovers that certain people are scheming to make the company go bankrupt. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Agent 116 Gopal (Dharmendra) is assigned the case to solve the mystery behind the missing of young women in Bombay. (Thriller,Action)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Gunaah
programme.desc: Tough cop Prabha (Bipasha Basu) is haunted by the demons of her past. Being an illegitimate daughter of a prostitute, she has had a very bad childhood and there once occurred an incident in her life when she was driven to the point of committing a murder. But today, now that she is a cop, she believes that she can clear her conscience by reforming a criminal. Prabha's life is turned topsy-turvy with the entry of Aditya (Dino Morea), who is a good person at heart but was forced to take the path of crime due to the wrong doing of the system. Prabha goes to Aditya's house to nab him, but gets carried away when she sees him bathing. Aditya slips from under her vigilant eyes and a hasty chase follows. Prabha stays close on the heels of fleeing Aditya. At one point when she is about to fall off the rooftop Aditya stops running and extends his hand to save her. This act makes a great impact on Prabha. Prabha decides to know Aditya's past and find out what prompted him to commit crime in the first place. She decides to reform him but herself gets 'reformed' into loving him in the process. (Drama)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Sautela Bhai
programme.desc: An uneducated young man falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy lawyer and wants to marry her. However, her father disapproves and threatens to acquire his brother's mortgaged property. (Drama)

programme.title: Numbri Aadmi
programme.desc: Rana (Amrish Puri) kills Inspector Anand Srivastav, and the only witness is Anand's son, Shankar. Years later, Shankar has grown up and has become a modern Robin Hood of sorts, robs the rich and distributes the wealth amongst the poor, especially a charitable hospital. Shankar comes to know that Rana is still alive, and attempts to avenge his father's death, only to find out that Rana has powerful friends, such as Assistant Commissioner of Police Vijay Pratap (Suresh Oberoi), who not only disbelief Shankar, but will prevent him from doing any harm to Rana. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Dumdaar - The Dynamic Hero
programme.desc: Aarti trusts Abhay and tells him that she has escaped from the clutches of Pandu, a rowdy. But little does she know that her life is at stake as Abhay informs Pandu about it. (Action)

programme.title: Jaalsaaz
programme.desc: Rakesh, a journalist, falls for Radha, who gets framed for the murder of a millionaire. Rakesh, along with his friends and leading defence lawyer, try to get to the truth and prove Radha innocent. (Thriller)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Masters
programme.desc: Milan Paul and Sreeramakrishnan are best friends who have been together since college. The intensity of their friendship has not faded though the carefree days of college have long past gone. Now Sree is an ASP (Assistant Superintendent of Police) of Kottayam and Milan is a renowned reporter in the same city. Though in different fields both are in highly responsible jobs. In effect, both of them use their friendship to fulfill their respective social responsibilities. (Crime,Thriller)

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Pardesi
programme.desc: An honest man is falsely convicted for a crime and is given the death sentence by the judge. Things take a turn when the judge comes across his doppelganger. (Action)

programme.title: Man on Mission Jaanbaaz
programme.desc: Sri is a 2005 Telugu film starring Manoj Mancu, Tamanna, and Mohan Babu. (Action)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz
programme.desc: Wealthy Lata I. Prasad refuses to obey her widower father's instructions to get married to equally wealthy Rajan, the second son of Sikanker Lal Thakkar, her dad's business partner. She runs away from home, and shortly thereafter her father locates her living with a truck-driver, Vishwa Pratap, and his pretty sister, Lakshmi. She refuses to return home, and insists on marrying Vishwa. She will soon regret her decision when she finds out that Vishwa has been arrested for killing a male named Billa, and may either spend his life behind bars or be hanged. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Insaaf Ki Takkar
programme.desc: Laxman Krishna, a criminal lawyer, manages to win all his cases. All the wrong-doers consider him as their God. But things change when he is assigned to defend the convicts who have murdered a girl. (Crime)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Kaali Topi Laal Rumaal
programme.desc: Vijay lives a poor lifestyle in India along with his widowed mom and brother, Raja. When their mom become seriously ill, they do not have money to pay for her medicines, Raja steals some money much to the chagrin of Vijay, who beats him and asks him to leave, but he is unable to save his mother. He decides to return the stolen money but finds the recipient, also named Vijay, has killed himself, leaving behind his near-destitute mother and a sister, Shalu. When told about her son's passing, the mother has a seizure and is hospitalized. When she recovers Vijay decides to not tell her about her son's passing and becomes her son instead. He joins the army and becomes a Commando. He single=handedly captures a terrorist, Master D.D., and holds him in a cell. Vijay then meets with Mohini and gets married to her. What Vijay does not know is that Master D.D. is but a mere pawn, the real kingpin behind this gang is an unknown assailant known only as Kaali Topi Laal Rumaal; that Raja, who has taken to petty crime as a career, is part of this gang and had accepted an assignment to abduct Shalu; and to complicate Vijay's life even more the Indian Army comes across evidence linking Mohini with D.D.'s gang. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
programme.desc: Roopa lives a wealthy lifestyle with her husband, Prakash Chandra, who works for her dad, Manoharlal Verma, and a daughter named Sharda alias Pinky. Roopa and Prakash do not get along and Roopa suspects that Prakash is having an affair. Her suspicious nature gets a boost when a woman named Sharda Dayal Sharma moves into a house next door. Roopa starts vile rumors about Sharda having an affair with Prakash. (Drama,Family)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Dil Ki Baazi
programme.desc: An unemployed youth faces challenges after he secures employment. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Basha: The Boss
programme.desc: At a construction site, a huge cache of weapons is discovered. Investigative Officers Balram and Varma use various tactics to nab the culprit. Will they succeed in their mission? (Action)

programme.title: Billa No. 786
programme.desc: After moving to Rampur, Shankar becomes a labourer and falls in love with Pinky but they face opposition from her father. Meanwhile, Shankar confronts a builder who tries to demolish his slum. (Action)

programme.title: Moksha
programme.desc: Sreenu's classmate invites him and his neighbour, Moksha, to Valentine's day party and get him drunk. Later, his friend tries to rape her but somehow dies a horrendous death. (Horror)

programme.title: A.X.L.
programme.desc: The life of a teenage boy is forever altered by a chance encounter with cutting edge military technology. (Science Fiction,Action,Adventure,Family)

programme.title: Paltan
programme.desc: A war drama based on the Indo-China War of 1962, JP Dutta's "PALTAN" focuses on the hard-hitting truth of India's relations with China, and how it is important to acknowledge that China, an enormous power in world politics, poses to be a huge threat to India. (War,Drama,Action)

programme.title: Sandwich
programme.desc: Sher Singh lives with his mother and handicapped sister in Punjab but moves to Mumbai, changes his name to Shekhar, meets Nisha and falls in love. When his mother asks him to return, he explains to Nisha that if he takes her before they are married the people would make an issue of it and promises to return in 4 days. On his return... (Comedy,Mystery)

programme.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
programme.desc: A musical romantic movie exploring the journey that ensues when the blue blooded boy Inder, "Who wanted to love no one" crosses paths with Saru, "Whom no one wanted to love". All their lives they were waiting to meet, but they just didn't know it . A musical tale of love , longing and loss. Sanam Teri Kasam - A Love story sealed with a Curse. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Fifteen years after an 'incident' at a Japanese nuclear power plant, physicist Joe Brody joins forces with his soldier son Ford to discover for themselves what really happened. What they uncover is prelude to global-threatening devastation. An epic rebirth to Toho's iconic Godzilla, this spectacular adventure pits the world's most famous monster against malevolent creatures who, bolstered by humanity's scientific arrogance, threaten our very existence. (Action,Science Fiction,Thriller)

programme.title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
programme.desc: Amongst the communal riots that erupt in the city, Tara shelters a wayward Sakina from a crazed mob and a bond that blossoms into love is created. The two eventually get married and have a son. The happy family, now living in Amritsar, gets the shock of their lives when Sakina learns that her father (Amrish Puri), whom she previously believed died in the riots back in Amritsar, is still alive after seeing his picture in a tattered, old newspaper. Upon contacting him, Sakina's father, now the mayor of Lahore in Pakistan, arranges for his daughter to arrive in Lahore to see him. Sakina leaves for Lahore minus Tara and her son, and upon reaching the city, learns of her father's plans for her - plans that include forcing Sakina to forget about her family and start life anew in Pakistan. Then begins an extraordinary journey which will lead Tara to cross the border into Pakistan to find his love Sakina (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
programme.desc: In a small Minnesota town, the annual beauty pageant is being covered by a TV crew. Former winner Gladys Leeman wants to make sure her daughter follows in her footsteps; explosions, falling lights, and trailer fires prove that. As the Leemans are the richest family in town, the police are pretty relaxed about it all. Despite everything, main rival (but sweet) Amber Atkins won't give up without a fight. (Comedy)

programme.title: Yahaan
programme.desc: Yahaan is a 2005 Hindi war drama, romance film. The cast consists of Jimmy Shergill, Minissha Lamba and Yashpal Sharma. (War,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Welcome 2 Karachi
programme.desc: On a drunk night, Shammi suggests that he and Kedar leave for America on a cruise, even though they laugh it off in that instance, in a freak accident by the sea, Kedar and Shammi who are supposed to manage a wedding baraat on a cruise, leave without the baraatis only to lose their direction and land up in Karachi, Pakistan. (Comedy)

programme.title: The Wonder Dog Simba
programme.desc: A lonely cannabis smoker falls in love with his neighbour Madhu after she requests him to look after her dog, Simba. Mahesh befriends Simba to help him impress Madhu. (Drama)

programme.title: Robocroc
programme.desc: When a top-secret unmanned spacecraft disintegrates on re-entry, its mysterious military payload crash-lands in the crocodile habitat of a place called Adventure Land, a combination water park, amusement land, and world-famous crocodile exhibit. Following its pre-programmed instructions, the payload—a next-generation nanotech-based combat drone—finds a host in the form of the park’s prize twenty-foot Australian Saltwater crocodile, Stella. She is the largest saltwater croc in captivity. Immediately upon infecting its host, the drone payload’s nanobots begin to transform Stella from an organic living creature into a lethal killing machine with only a single directive: survival! (Horror,Fantasy,Science Fiction)

programme.title: Bengal Tiger
programme.desc: Aakash is a guy who wants to become popular. He hits a state minister and joins him. He slowly becomes a friend of the home minister and falls in love with home minister's daughter. On the engagement between them, in the presence of state's chief minister, Aakash gives a huge shock to both the home and chief ministers. Rest of the story reveals the shock, and relations, flashback of Aakash with the ministers. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Geetha Govindam
programme.desc: Vijay Govind, a young college lecturer who dreams of marriage falls for Geetha, a level-headed woman who's wary of strangers and isn't easy to convince. While things seem to go smoothly, Vijay makes a terrible mistake which not only derails any hope for his love story, but also potential repercussions with his family. (Romance)

programme.title: Toilet - Ek Prem Katha
programme.desc: Keshav and Jaya are from two villages near Mathura, where at least 80% of households are without any access to a lavatories. Conflict comes knocking on the first day of their marriage, when Jaya leaves Keshav's house for good, after discovering that there is no toilet in the home. Distraught and desperate, Keshav sets out on mission to win back his love- by battling against the age old traditions, mind-set and value system of his country. (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Velaiyilla Pattathari
programme.desc: Raghuvaran, who is unemployed for years, gets his dream job but a powerful rival is keen to put him down. Can he take on his adversary? (Action,Romance,Comedy)

programme.title: Saina
programme.desc: Champion. Olympic Medallist. The Doyen of Indian Badminton. Saina Nehwal is all of this and much more. This biopic chronicles the inspiring story of a gifted youngster's ascendance to the pinnacle of the Badminton World through sheer passion and perseverance. (Drama)
